title: Philips ACC8120 Pocket Memo USB Docking Station
features: Compatible with: Digital Pocket Memo DPM8000, DPM8100, DPM6000, DPM7000 & DPM8500
description: [PHILIPS_LOGO.JPG] CATEGORY: RECORDERS, DIGITAL DICTATING MANUFACTURER: PHILIPS SPEECH PROCESSING USA INC. - PHILIPS SPEECH PROCESSING PART NUMBER: ACC812000 UPC: 605342059053 The Pocket Memo docking station allows you to easily transfer all your dictations to your computer as well as quickly charge your device, so you are always ready to go. Combined with the optional foot pedal, it is possible to record hands-free and transcribe even without a computer.
